TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCTileMapAtlas extends Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode

Docs.summary: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTileMapAtlas" /> is a subclass of <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" />. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTileMapAtlas" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" />
Docs.remarks: <para>It knows how to render a map based of tiles. The tiles must be in a .PNG format while the map must be a .TGA file.</para><para>For more information regarding the format, please see this post: <ulink url="http://www.cocos2d-iphone.org/archives/27">http://www.cocos2d-iphone.org/archives/27</ulink></para><ulink url="http://www.cocos2d-iphone.org/archives/27">http://www.cocos2d-iphone.org/archives/27</ulink><para>All features from <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" /> are valid in <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTileMapAtlas" /></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCAtlasNode" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTileMapAtlas" /><para>IMPORTANT: This class is deprecated. It is maintained for compatibility reasons only. You SHOULD not use this class. Instead, use the newer TMX file format: <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTMXTiledMap" /></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTMXTiledMap" />

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: creates a TileMap with a tile file (atlas) with a map file and the width and height of each tile in points. The tile file will be loaded using the TextureMgr.
Docs.remarks: <para> <verbatim>creates a TileMap with a tile file (atlas) with a map file and the width and height of each tile in points. </verbatim> The tile file will be loaded using the TextureMgr. </para><verbatim>creates a TileMap with a tile file (atlas) with a map file and the width and height of each tile in points. </verbatim>
